data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta 2
data.actual_result: The status bar has the wrong color.
data.expected_result: Status bar should be colored correct to be good visible
data.short_description: [Dark theme only] In-app browser: Status bar with wrong color for images opened in browser
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your user settings - Go to web browser - Change your browser to the in-app one - Upload any image to Discord or link one - Click on this image to open image preview - Click again on this image and open the image in the browser by clicking on the 3 dots - Observe the status bar
